headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Slides Heading Into Final Session of 2024

headline: NVIDIA Partner Super Micro Ends $50 Million Loan, Shares Fall
summary: Financial challenges persist, including delayed reporting and auditor turnover, with Nasdaq granting an extension until February 2025.

headline: Top 10 S&P 500 stocks account for 59% of gains since 2022
summary: Ten stocks leading the S&P 500 (^GSPC) accounted for 59% of the index's gains since 2022. Tech names like Nvidia (NVDA), Super Micro Computer (SMCI), and Broadcom (AVGO) lead the index higher. Madison Mills breaks down the performance of the top 10 names and compares it to that of the next 10 stocks and the rest of the S&P 500 components, examining what it signals about market breadth. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
